reference.shortdesc: Learn more about the Boxer and German Shepherd breeds. These external links provide detailed information about the breeds’ temperament, energy levels, and care needs.

section.title: Boxer Breed Information
section.p: For an overview of the Boxer breed, including health, exercise, and personality traits, visit the American Kennel Club (AKC) Boxer breed page:

section.title: German Shepherd Breed Information
section.p: For an overview of the German Shepherd breed, including care, socialization, and training needs, visit the American Kennel Club (AKC) German Shepherd breed page:

section.title: Why This Matters for Cerberus
section.p: Cerberus is a Boxer–German Shepherd mix. Understanding these breeds’ general characteristics can help adopters prepare for his high energy, intelligence, and need for structured activity. Individual personality and history will vary, so use this as general context only.
